title: Assomadouro
body: A place in the parish of Prazeres, from where a beautiful landscape of the coastal area can be seen, stretching from Jardim do Mar to the parish of Fajã da Ovelha.

Prazeres: Beautiful landscape of the coastal area
Jardim do Mar: Beautiful landscape of the coastal area
Fajã da Ovelha: Beautiful landscape of the coastal area
